doc.title: All That Jazz: An Interview with Roy Scheider
doc.plot: On set interview with Roy Scheider during the filming of _All That Jazz (1979)_ (qv). Shot on the set of the apartment bedroom, during the making of the film. Scheider talks about what surprised him about 'Bob Fosse' (qv), the physical demands he experienced on this film & about the role of Joe Gideon in general.
